dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The SDMetrics library provides a set of dataset-agnostic tools for
evaluating the quality of a synthetic database by comparing it to the
real database that it is modeled after.
dependent_to.name: py-sdmetrics

dependent_to.description:
The Synthetic Data Vault (SDV) is a Synthetic Data Generation ecosystem
of libraries that allows users to easily learn single-table, multi-table
and timeseries datasets to later on generate new Synthetic Data that has
the same format and statistical properties as the original dataset.
dependent_to.name: py-sdv

description:
Copulas is a Python library for modeling multivariate distributions and
sampling from them using copula functions. Given a table containing
numerical data, we can use Copulas to learn the distribution and later
on generate new synthetic rows following the same statistical
properties.
name: py-copulas

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
